name: The Espy Hostel
description:
*** We are an international and interstate focused hostel. Therefore, a legitimate passport ID is required on check-in. Strictly NO local stays. Accommodation is not intended for local housing. ***  
While some of our dorm rooms have age restrictions, we're happy to offer accomodations for all ages- everyone is warmly welcomed. Please take care when choosing your appropriate dorm room.

Welcome to the â€œTHE ESPY â€œHostel. 

Our Budget friendly Hostel is perfectly located in the heart of Cairns Esplanade. Within only a few steps you can be at some of Cairns Cityâ€™s favourite places including the Lagoon pool, waterfront, marina, cafes, bars and much more. 

â€œTHE ESPY â€œHostel is well known for its Quiet, chilled, and relaxed vibe with many of our guests labeling it a home away from home. 
We offer excellent weekly long-term rates for working backpackers who wish to be able to walk to work and have a quiet homely place to rest at the end of the day. 

While we do encourage a social beverage by the pool on a hot summer day, we also have a Strict NO noise and NO alcohol policy after 10pm. So, for those who love a good party into the night will have to head out and enjoy all the bustling bars and night clubs Cairns have to offer and remember to sneak back home quietlyðŸ˜‰

We not only offer dorm stays but have newly renovated private rooms available at great affordable prices. Please note our dorm stays are for under 35â€™s only but donâ€™t let that deter you, we have all ages join us here and have many private rooms available for us to welcome you too.
Come hang by the pool, cook a meal amongst friends in our fully equipped kitchen, chill out in our lounge area and join us for our occasional pop-up social events. 

Please note we are a fully SELF check in hostel, but our friendly staff are always happy to help and are only a phone call away. 

We look forward to welcoming you and hope to see you soon.
THE ESPY TEAM. 

Check in after 1400. 
Check out before 1000. 
Children are not allowed. Min age for check in is 18. 
Please contact us directly for after hour check in.
